package.name: lin3s/wordpress-standard
package.description: The "Wordpress Standard Edition" distribution in the LIN3S way

dev-master.name: lin3s/wordpress-standard
dev-master.description: The "Wordpress Standard Edition" distribution in the LIN3S way

suggest.sitepress-multilingual-cms: It allows to implement the multilingual in an easy way
suggest.wpml-media: It allows to implement the multilingual in an easy way
suggest.wpml-string-translation: It allows to implement the multilingual in an easy way
suggest.wpackagist-plugin\/categories-images: It allows to assign easily images to categories
suggest.wpackagist-plugin\/contact-form-7: It allows to manage the contact form without code, all inside WP panel
suggest.wpackagist-plugin\/ml-slider: It allows a complete management of sliders. Ideal when the site has a lot and different sliders
suggest.wpackagist-plugin\/template-selector: It allows to declare templates programmatically to reference them from the wp-routing component
